text: 12.15: Lo 29.18; FG 8.23; 2 Ko 6.1; Ga 5.4; Hi 3.12Nde tuituigira wari ganɨri. Nde muuŋv kɨv, nde the rɨgɨp, Fhe Bakɨme kora muumbara tharga. Nde vhɨra muuŋv kɨv, nde the gɨrgɨrgi vhɨgi mbai khage farar muuŋgip, nde rɨgar kɨv, simtɨgar nden nɨɨŋv, nden muuŋrim, nde Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzaŋgirga.
